messages.subject: Fw: NYTimes.com Article: U.S. Proposes End to Testing for Salmonella in School Beef
messages.msgSnippet: Just one more reason to be glad one s children are not in kiddy prison! BTW, the program they are proposing in lieu of the testing for salmonella has had
messages.messageBody:
Just one more reason to be glad one's children are not in kiddy prison!
BTW, the program they are proposing in lieu of the testing for salmonella
has had little testing done to prove that it is effective and on testing
done to see the long term effects on children. AND, the real reason, big
money to be made by the folks that do the irradiation!

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
>
> U.S. Proposes End to Testing for Salmonella in School Beef
>
> By MARIAN BURROS
>
> The Bush administration has proposed dropping testing for salmonella
> in ground beef for the federal school-lunch program and letting
> schools serve beef that has been irradiated.
>
>
http://www.nytimes.com/2001/04/05/education/05MEAT.html?ex=987481322&ei=1&en
=6a185ffdc9095036
